GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v5.15.33
GSD.description:
clk: Fix clk_hw_get_clk() when dev is NULL

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit 4be3e4c05d8dd1b83b75652cad88c9e752ec7054, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit 30d6f8c15d2cd877c1f3d47d8a1064649ebe58e2. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: clk: Fix clk_hw_get_clk() when dev is NULL
